exceptions.exn: In environment X, Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x i : nat a : X ll, mm : list X j : nat IHll : link i (ll ++ mm) j = link i ll j ++ link (length ll + i) mm (lsum ll + j) Unable to unify "link i (ll ++ mm) j = link i ll j ++ link (length ll + i) mm (lsum ll + j)" with "link (S i) (ll ++ mm) (lc a + j) = link (S i) ll (lc a + j) ++ link (S (length ll + i)) mm (lc a + lsum ll + j)".

original: induction ll. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. apply IHll.
